item.title: 人工智能热潮推动美国燃气发电意外复苏
item.description:
新天然气工厂不断涌现，打破了人们对其快速增长即将结束的预期。【原文：

New gas plants just keep on coming, defying expectations that their rapid growth was nearing an end.

】

item.title: 花旗称特朗普和哈里斯的政纲均不利于股市
item.description: 花旗集团策略师认为，唐纳德-特朗普和卡马拉-哈里斯的政纲似乎都对美国股市不利，其中民主党候选人提高企业税的计划影响最大。【原文：Both Donald Trump’s and Kamala Harris’s political platforms appear negative for US equities, with the Democratic candidate’s plans to raise corporate tax seen having the biggest impact, according to Citigroup Inc. strategists.】

item.title: 华尔街策略师称股市反弹的增长因素大于美联储因素
item.description: 华尔街顶级策略师认为，美联储本周备受期待的降息幅度与美国经济的健康状况相比，与股票的关系不大。【原文：The size of the Federal Reserve’s highly anticipated interest-rate cut this week is less relevant for equities than the health of the US economy, according to top Wall Street strategists.】

item.title: 机场运营商 CAAP 表示对肯尼亚投资感兴趣
item.description: 世界最大的机场运营商之一美洲机场公司（Corporacion America Airports SA）三个月前曾表示有兴趣投资肯尼亚机场，但尚未得到肯尼亚当局的回应。【原文：Corporacion America Airports SA, one of the world’s largest airport operators, expressed an interest in investing in Kenyan airfields three months ago and has yet to receive a response from the authorities.】

item.title: 分析师称，BBVA 必须改善萨瓦德尔竞购方案，否则将退出竞购
item.description: Alantra Equities 的一位分析师说，Banco Sabadell SA 股价的上涨最终将迫使 BBVA SA 要么对这家规模较小的竞争对手提出更好的收购要约，要么放弃敌意收购的努力。【原文：A rising Banco Sabadell SA share price will ultimately force BBVA SA to either make a better offer for the smaller rival or abandon its hostile takeover effort, an Alantra Equities analyst said.】

item.title: 我们与人工智能聊天机器人的互动方式正在发生变化
item.description: 2022 年，当 OpenAI 推出其 ChatGPT 聊天机器人时，新一代人工智能工具似乎即将改变经济和人们生活的每一个角落。时间快进到 2024 年，人工智能功能已被添加到无数服务中，但其影响可以说还没有那么大。【原文：When OpenAI launched its ChatGPT chatbot in 2022, it looked as if a new generation of artificial intelligence tools was about to transform every corner of the economy and people’s lives. Fast-forward to 2024 and AI features have been added to countless services, but the impact has arguably not been quite so dramatic.】

item.title: 印度热闹的 IPO 市场正在为更大规模的首次公开募股做准备
item.description: 在近期首次公开募股获得数倍收益后，印度公司正在测试投资者对更大规模首次公开募股的胃口。【原文：Indian companies are testing investors appetite for bigger initial public offerings after recent debuts raked in multifold gains.】

item.title: 纽约银行是最新一家扩大对冲基金和私人信贷渠道的银行
item.description: 纽约梅隆银行（Bank of New York Mellon Corp.）希望富有的投资者能够更容易地从阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.）、蓝猫头鹰资本公司（Blue Owl Capital）和高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Bank of New York Mellon Corp. wants wealthy investors to have easier access to private assets from the likes of Apollo Global Management Inc., Blue Owl Capital and Goldman Sachs Group Inc.】

item.title: 巴克莱称英国应重新审查股票购买印花税
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，英国政府应重新考虑征收股票购买税，以提振该国萎靡不振的股市。【原文：The UK government should review a tax on share purchases to boost the country’s ailing stock market, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 阿拉比卡咖啡飙升至 2011 年以来最高，供应困境加剧
item.description: 随着持续的供应中断将优质阿拉比卡咖啡豆的成本推向 13 年来最高点，一杯咖啡将变得更加昂贵。【原文：A cup of coffee is set to get even pricier as persistent supply disruptions push costs for premium arabica beans to the highest in 13 years.】

item.title: 美的股价在香港灰市交易中上涨 4.9
item.description: 中国家电制造商美的集团股份有限公司（Midea Group Co.【原文：Chinese appliance maker Midea Group Co.’s shares gained as much as 4.9% in gray-market trading ahead of their Tuesday debut in Hong Kong.】

item.title: 美联储降息幅度超过石油暴跌，海湾国家债券反弹加剧
item.description: 上周，来自石油资源丰富的波斯湾地区的伊斯兰证券创下了自2021年2月以来最长的周连胜纪录，原因是投资者摆脱了原油价格暴跌的影响，转而关注美联储即将推出的宽松政策。【原文：Islamic securities from the oil-rich Persian Gulf notched their longest weekly winning streak since February 2021 last week as investors shrugged off plunging crude prices, instead turning their attention to imminent Federal Reserve easing.】

item.title: 挪威 Crayon 集团大涨，据说 SoftwareOne 正在权衡交易事宜
item.description: 挪威软件集团克劳恩集团控股公司（Crayon Group Holding ASA）的股价创下四年多来的最大涨幅，因为有熟悉内情的人士称，该公司在瑞士的较大竞争对手SoftwareOne Holding AG公司正在探讨两家公司合并的可能性。【原文：Norwegian software group Crayon Group Holding ASA jumped by the most in more than four years after people familiar with the matter said its bigger Swiss rival SoftwareOne Holding AG is exploring a potential combination of the two firms.】

item.title: 澳大利亚第一大食糖生产商的工人投票决定结束罢工
item.description: 澳大利亚最大的蔗糖生产商的工人投票接受了新的薪酬协议，结束了数月来的工业行动。【原文：Workers at Australia’s largest sugar producer have voted to accept a new pay agreement, ending months of industrial action.】

item.title: 诺华乳腺癌药物有助于延缓疾病复发
item.description: 诺华公司（Novartis AG）的乳腺癌药物有助于防止治疗结束一年后复发，新数据将与礼来公司（Eli Lilly）的竞争对手产品进行密切比较。【原文：Novartis AG’s breast cancer drug helped prevent the disease coming back a year after treatment had ended, in new data that will be closely compared with a rival product from Eli Lilly.】

item.title: 拜耳希望扩大前列腺癌药物的使用范围
item.description: 拜耳公司（Bayer AG）快速畅销的前列腺癌药物降低了病情恶化的风险，这些数据可能会使该药物获准在更大范围内使用。【原文：Bayer AG’s fast-selling prostate cancer drug reduced the risk of the disease progressing in data that could see it receive approval for wider use.】

item.title: 尽管美国收紧限制，中国仍声称芯片制造取得进展
item.description: 中国宣称在研发国产芯片制造设备方面取得了突破性进展，这是为克服美国旨在阻挠中国政府实现半导体目标的制裁而迈出的重要一步。【原文：China has claimed a breakthrough in the development of homegrown chipmaking equipment, an important step in overcoming US sanctions designed to thwart Beijing’s semiconductor goals.】

item.title: 德国股票接近历史最高点，海湾地区首获 ETF
item.description: 海湾地区的投资者即将获得第一只跟踪德国市场的交易所交易基金，德国市场的交易价格已接近历史最高点。【原文：Investors in the Gulf are about to get their first exchange-traded fund tracking the German market which has been trading near record highs.】

item.title: 印度获得 3860 亿美元融资承诺以推动绿色能源发展
item.description: 印度可再生能源部从银行和金融机构获得了合计 3860 亿美元的投资承诺，该部正努力为经济去碳化提供资金支持。【原文：India’s renewable energy ministry received combined investment commitments of $386 billion from banks and financial institutions, as it seeks to shore up funding to decarbonize the economy.】

item.title: 乔希-布朗如何创建金融媒体帝国
item.description:
"改革派经纪人 "是如何大红大紫的？【原文：

How "The Reformed Broker" made it big.

】

item.title: S.政治紧张局势缓解，非洲农业企业情绪回升
item.description: 南非大选后组成了一个广泛的执政联盟，政治不确定性随之消退，南非农业企业的情绪急剧高涨。【原文：Sentiment among South Africa’s agricultural businesses advanced sharply as political uncertainty receded after the post-election formation of a broad governing alliance.】

item.title: 英国采取行动关闭伊朗石油大亨网络中的伦敦公司
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士说，英国政府正在打击侯赛因-沙姆哈尼（Hossein Shamkhani）领导的石油贸易帝国，沙姆哈尼的公司网络因帮助将伊朗和俄罗斯原油运往世界各地而备受关注。【原文：The UK government is cracking down on an oil trading empire led by Hossein Shamkhani, whose web of firms have drawn scrutiny for helping move Iranian and Russian crude around the world, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）称大众考虑裁员 1.5 万人关闭工厂
item.description: 据杰富瑞（Jefferies）分析师称，大众汽车公司可能在今年强行通过关闭工厂的决定，为裁员超过 15000 人铺平道路。【原文：Volkswagen AG could force through decisions on plant closures this year, paving the way for more than 15,000 job cuts, according to analysts at Jefferies.】

item.title: 阿波罗与英国石油公司达成协议，出资 10 亿美元收购天然气连接公司股份
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的一份声明，阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management）与英国石油公司（BP Plc）达成了一项 10 亿美元的交易，为其在跨亚得里亚海天然气管道中的股份提供资金。【原文：Apollo Global Management has struck a $1 billion deal with BP Plc to fund its stake in the Trans Adriatic natural gas pipeline, according to a statement seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 尼日利亚国营石油公司预计汽油价格将上涨 11
item.description: 根据从丹格特炼油厂采购石油的新协议，尼日利亚国家石油公司预计汽油价格将上涨约 11%。【原文：Nigeria’s state oil company expects gasoline prices to increase about 11% under a new deal to source petroleum from the Dangote Refinery.】

item.title: 裕信银行开始回购 17 亿欧元，兑现最高支付承诺
item.description: 意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）表示，将开始回购多达 17 亿欧元（18.9 亿美元）的自有股票，以兑现欧洲银行中最大的赔付承诺。【原文：UniCredit SpA said it will start repurchasing as much as €1.7 billion ($1.89 billion) of its own stock as it delivers on the biggest payout pledge among European banks.】

item.title: 新加坡准备进行 "大胆变革 "以重振股市
item.description: 新加坡财政部第二部长表示，新加坡准备对监管结构进行 "大胆改革"，试图重振萎靡不振的股市。【原文：Singapore is prepared to make “bold changes” to regulatory structures in an attempt to revive its languishing stock market, according to its Second Minister for Finance.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：市场关键周伊始，英镑上涨
item.description: 伦敦城。摄影师：Mike Kemp/Getty Images【原文：The City of London. Photographer: Mike Kemp/Getty Images】

item.title: 芯片初创公司 Groq 与阿美石油公司达成协议，支持沙特的人工智能雄心
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Groq Inc. 与石油生产商阿美石油公司（Aramco）合作，在沙特阿拉伯建立了一个巨型数据中心，希望它能成为中东、非洲和印度各地运行人工智能系统的公司的枢纽。【原文：Artificial intelligence startup Groq Inc. has partnered with oil producer Aramco to build a giant data center in Saudi Arabia that it hopes will become a hub for companies running AI systems across the Middle East, Africa and India.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】
